title: Netanyahu's Draft Law Plan
body: Israeli PM Netanyahu claims a draft law will bring 17,000 Chareidim into the army within three years, calling it a historic breakthrough.

title: Racism in Chareidi Education
body: Israeli watchdog group Movement for Quality Government demands Attorney General Gali Baharav-Miara open disciplinary proceedings against Chareidi education official Chaya Mashan over racist student classifications.
